column2: I remember Glasgow hosting COP26 last year, but unfortunately I was out of the loop. What was the conference about?
Interesting. What are the effects of these climate changes?
That’s rather vague. Can you be more specific about the effects of climate change?
Woah. The effects of climate change are not all bad, right?
That’s interesting. Tell me more about how climate change affects developing countries.
How are developed countries helping developing countries adapt to climate change?
Are developed countries meeting their pledges to provide climate financial support to developing countries in the Paris Agreement?
That’s not too relevant to my question. By the way, is the Paris Agreement related to COP26 in Glasgow?
So what happens at each Conference of Parties?
How are the Kyoto Protocol and Paris Agreement different?
How did other parties to the Paris Agreement feel about Trump’s intention of withdrawing the US from it?
I’d like to appreciate my mum by making her a beauty pamper pack. What do you put in one?
Can I make the beauty products at home?
How much would making my own deodorant cost?
Can you tell me how to make a body scrub at home?
Cool. Can you tell me how to make a moisturizer at home?
My mum loves a good, scented lotion. Let’s make that
I need more information about purchasing an unscented lotion base
What types of essential oils should I consider when making my own scented lotion?
Okay, so how do I mix the unscented lotion and the essential oils?
Cool. Which smartphone would you recommend for me?
Tell me more about the Motorola Moto G7 Power.
How much cheaper is the Samsung Galaxy A10e than the Motorola Moto G7 Power?
Wow, that's almost half the cost of a Samsung Galaxy A10e. Can you compare the Samsung Galaxy A10e with the Motorola Moto G7 Power?
Interesting. What makes the Motorola G7 such a good award-winning phone?
Why is the Samsung Galaxy A50 better than the Moto G7?
I've heard iPhones look and feel great. Should I get an iPhone?
Which iPhone should I get?
Besides iPhones and Android phones, what other types of phones are out there?
Why not?  Aren’t other mobile platforms as good as Android or iOS?
I would like to run most aspects of my day-to-day life with my new phone.
Your answer is for a watch. What type of phone should I get to run my day-to-day life?
How do I get back into running after a year-long break due to work commitments?
Cool. What exercises can I mix with running?
What strength exercises do you recommend to mix with running?
Awesome. Can I do these strength routines and run on the same day?
Cool. Do you have any tips to lose weight by running?
How often should I run to lose weight?
What if I run on an empty stomach to lose weight?
So what's a better alternative to running on an empty stomach?
Hmm. Why isn’t running on an empty stomach a good idea for leisure athletes?
So is it best to avoid running on an empty stomach as a leisure athlete?
Okay. Are there better calorie-burning exercises to try asides from running?
I don’t have an indoor bike and neither am I great at skiing. What good alternative to running is there asides from indoor cycling and cross-country skiing?
I suppose I could do jumping rope or kickboxing, but I like the outdoors and would like to work out there.
I live in a flat on the third floor. How do I do jump rope at home?
What was the basis of the Watergate scandal?
Oh wow. Why did the Nixon administration break in at Democratic National Committee?
What happened next after the Watergate intruders stood trial for their participation in the break-in?
Did Congress and federal prosecution get Nixon's taped conversations in the Oval Office?
So what happened to Nixon after the events of the Watergate scandal?
What effects did the Watergate scandal have on US politics?
What effects did the Watergate scandal have on President Nixon's legacy?
Interesting name. What’s the story behind Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein’s informant’s name “Deep Throat”?
Did the public ever find out who Deep Throat was?
Let’s say Deep Throat was Mark Felt. Why did he decide to be an informant for Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein?
What do you think about Bostrom's "simulation argument"?
Which of Bostrom's "simulation argument" trilemma is most likely?
Deep. What do other philosophers think about Bostrom's "simulation argument"?
How would we know that we are living in a simulation?
Okay, so what do glitches in the simulation prove about our existence in it?
The multiverse theory sounds like the plot of a Marvel movie. It's too fantastic to be true.

Awesome. He cares a lot about looks also. What can I do about that?
Do you think social media might play a role in my son's low self-esteem?
How do I prevent social media from impacting my son's self-esteem?
Hey! I’d love to learn something interesting about the wonders of the world
Why did Larry Newton dislike “What a wonderful world” by Louis Armstrong?
Did sales of “What a Wonderful World” by Louis Armstrong ever get better in the US?
Okay, but how did “Good Morning, Vietnam” help the sales of What a Wonderful World”
No, not the song. I’m talking about the world's most spectacular natural features and human-built structures.
Tell me about some of the wonders in Asia
Wow, that’s a lot of deaths. How is the Great Wall of China maintained?
Okay. So what’s another famous landmark in Asia besides the Great Wall of China?
The Taj Mahal sounds beautiful. Tell me more about how the Taj Mahal was built
Amazing. If I was travelling to Asia would you recommend I visit the Taj Mahal or the Great Wall of China?
Tell me about another natural and architectural wonder outside of Asia
What are the other natural wonders of the world besides the Great Barrier Reef?
This is all very interesting. Makes me wonder if there’s a relationship between architecture and nature.
I like that philosophy. Form should follow function. Is the Taj Mahal an example of Organic Architecture?
As a tourist, what’s the best place to visit in Nigeria?
Cross River is where Obudu Cattle Ranch is located, no?
Tell me more about the Obudu Mountain Resort (formerly Obudu Cattle Ranch).
Duke town. I’m intrigued. Tell me more about Duke Town in Calabar.
Where did the name Calabar come about then?
Tell me about tourism in Nigeria.
How's the tourism sector in Nigeria managed?
What’s an example of one of Nigerian Tourism Development Corporation’s initiatives?
What’s another place worth visiting in Nigeria aside from Calabar?
I used to work there and it was crazy and chaotic. Abuja is better than Lagos, I think.
Well, tell me about Nigerian food.
Is eating fufu without chewing safe?
Fair enough. As a tourist, what are some Nigerian recipes I must try?
That’s very cool. Which country or community’s jollof rice recipe is the best?
Wow. Tell me how Nigerian and Ghanaian Jollof rice are different
Nigerian and Ghanaian Jollof are quite different, aren’t they? What region did Jollof rice originate from?
That’s a great jollof rice discussion. Tell me the other must try Nigerian dishes.
Sounds yummy! Is there a third Nigerian dish that I need to try?
